definitions.title: adj. num.
definitions.body: one (Ph. [[אחד]], Sab. id., cf. DHM:ZMG 1876, 707, Ar. 0’ah.adun, Eth. 0’ah.adi Aram. [[חַד]], h.ad; on As. edu, aḫadu, cf. Dl:W No. 139)—abs. ´[[א]] Ge 1:5 + cstr. [[אַחַ֫ד]] Ge 21:15 +; so even bef. prep. 1Sa 9:3 al. v. Dr; f. abs. [[אַחַ֫ת]] Ge 2:21 +; [[אֶחָָת]] Ge 11:1 +; cstr. [[אַחַ֫ת]] De 13:13 +; pl. m. [[אֲחָדִים]] Ge 11:1 + 4t.; [[חַד]] Ez Eze 33:30 del. Co cf. LXX;—

one Ge 1:9, Ge 27:38, Ge 27:45, Ex 12:49, Jos 23:10, 1Sa 1:24, 2Sa 12:3 +, Zec 14:9, Mal 2:10, Job 31:15 +, so also (emph.) 2Sa 17:3 for MT [[אֲשֶׁר]] LXX We Dr; one or two [[לאׁ לְיוֹם אֶחָד]] [[וְלאׁ לִשְׁנַיִם]] Ezr 10:13; as subst. sq. [[מִן]] Ge 2:21, Le 4:2, Le 4:13, Is 34:16 +; ´[[הָא]] Ge 19:9, Ge 42:13, Ge 42:32, 2Ki 6:3, 2Ki 6:5 +; one and the same Ge 40:5, Job 31:15; pl. [[דְּבָרִים אֲחָדִים]] † Ge 11:1 cf. Ez Eze 37:17 (abs.), but v. Co; = few, a few ´[[יׇמִים א]] † Ge 27:44, Ge 29:20, Da 11:20; [[כְּאִישׁ אֶחָד]] as one man, together Ju Jdg 20:8, 1Sa 11:7; also [[כְּאֶחָד]] late = Aram. [[כַּחֲדָא]] † Ezr 2:64 (= Ne 7:66) Ezr 3:9, Ezr 6:20, Ec 11:6; v. esp. Is 65:25 (‖ earlier [[יַחְדֶּו]] Is 11:6, Is 11:7).
= each, every Ex 36:30, Nu 7:3, Nu 7:85, Nu 28:21, 1Ki 4:7, 2Ki 15:20 +; also repeated, distrib. sense Nu 7:11, Nu 13:2, Nu 17:21, Jos 3:12, Jos 4:2, Jos 4:4.
= a certain 1Sa 1:1, 2Sa 18:10, 2Ki 4:1, Es 3:8 + cf. 2Sa 17:9 v. Dr 1Sa 1:1; hence
= indef. art. 1Sa 6:7, 1Sa 24:15, 1Sa 26:20 (but del. LXX We Dr) 1Ki 19:4, 1Ki 19:5 +.

only 1Ki 4:19; & (fem.) once 2Ki 6:10, Ps 62:12, Ps 89:36 (once for all); [[אַחַת לְשָׁלוֹשׁ שָׁנִים]] 2Ch 9:21, [[בַּשָּׁנׇה]] ´[[א]] Le 16:34 cf. Job 40:5, [[פַּעַם אֶחָָת]] Jos 6:3, Jos 6:11 cf. v:Jos 6:14, [[בְּאַחַת]] Nu 10:4, Job 33:14; at once [[בְּאֶחָָת]] Pr 28:18 cf. [[וְאִנׇּֽקְמֶה נְקַם־אַחַת]] Ju Jdg 16:28.

one…another, the one…the other ´[[א]] … ´[[א]] Ex 17:12, Ex 18:3, Ex 18:4, Am 4:7, 2Sa 12:1, Je 24:2, 2Ch 3:17, Ne 4:11 +; 2Sa 14:6 rd. [[הָאֶחָד אֶת־אָחִיו]] for [[האחד את־האחד]] LXX We Dr; one after another, one by one, [[לְאַחַד אֶחָד]] Is 27:12 cf. Ec 7:27.

as ordinal, first (mostly P & late) Ge 1:5 (P) Ge 2:11 (J) Ex 39:10 (P); Ez Eze 10:14 esp. of first day of month Ex 40:2 (P) Ezr 3:6, Ezr 10:16, Ezr 10:17, Ne 8:2, Hag 1:1; first year, [[שְׁנַת אַחַת]] 2Ch 36:22, Ezr 1:1, Da 1:21, Da 9:1, Da 9:2, Da 11:1 abs. Job 42:14 cf. first (day, [[יוֹם]] om.) Ge 8:5, Ge 8:13 [[בְּאֶחָד לַחׂדֶשׁ]]; so Ex 40:17, Le 23:24, Nu 1:18, Nu 29:1, Nu 33:38 (all P) De 1:3, 2Ch 29:17, Ezr 7:9, Ezr 7:9, Ez Eze 26:1, Eze 29:17, Eze 31:1, Eze 32:1, Eze 45:18.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: [[אַחַד עָשָׂר]] eleven (cf. [[עָשָׂר]], [[עַשְׁתֵּי]]) Ge 32:23, Ge 37:9 (JE) De 1:2; so [[אַחַת־עֶשְׂרֵה]] Jos 15:51 (P) 2Ki 23:36, 2Ki 24:18, 2Ch 36:5, 2Ch 36:11, Je 52:1 (precedes noun, exc. Jos 15:51; as ordinal, eleventh [[אַחַת עֶשְׂרֵה שָׁנׇה]] Ez Eze 30:20, Eze 31:1 cf. 1Ki 6:38, 2Ki 9:29;

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: with other numerals, as cardinal [[אֶחָד וְאַרְבָּעִים אֶלֶף וַחֲמֵשׁ מֵאוֹת]] Nu 1:41 cf. Nu 2:16, Nu 2:28, Nu 31:34, Nu 31:39 (all P; ´[[א]] precedes other numeral); but [[אַרְבָּיִם וְאַחַת שָׁנׇה]] (´[[א]] following) 1Ki 14:21, 1Ki 15:10, 2Ki 14:23, 2Ch 12:l3 cf. 2Ki 22:1 = 2Ch 34:1; 2Ki 24:18 = Je 52:1 = 2Ch 36:11, Jos 12:24 (D) Is 30:17, Ezr 2:26 = Ne 7:30 cf. v:Ne 7:37; Da 10:13; as ordinal [[בְּאַחַת וְשֵׁשׁ מֵאוֹת שָׁנׇה]] Ge 8:13 (P) Ex 12:18 (P), 1Ch 24:17, 1Ch 25:28, 2Ch 16:13 (´[[א]] preceding); but 1Ki 16:23, Hag 2:1 (´[[א]] following).
